data.name: Part of You
data.detailed_description:
Part of You is an adventure game about finding yourself. On your journey you will meet colorful characters, explore the weird world of Hacksaw Springs, & use tools to flip, change, & rearrange characters' faces on your quest to recover your missing identity.

Tools

In Part of You, you will have to use a variety of tools in order to solve problems around town.
  • The Flipper: The flipper will turn any facial feature upside down. Need somebody to look away? What about change their mood? The flipper can do that.
  • The Stamp: Need a character to take on a new body part? The stamp will let you take a body part from another character and put it on somebody else. Just don’t make people too ugly…


  • The Mask: Ever felt like being somebody else for a little bit? Slide on a mask and become somebody else for a short while. It may not be the perfect disguise but at least you might get into some interesting conversations.
  • & Several More.

Hacksaw Springs


Hacksaw Springs may be a sleepy town, but it’s full of surprises and unseen secrets around every corner. Head over to the diner for a quick bite to eat, check out it’s famous flea market, leap from rooftop to rooftop to get a better view, crawl into utility corridors to help turn back on the lights, or just spend all your time in the convention center if you can find a way back in…

Characters

Over 50 unique characters fill the streets of Hacksaw Springs. Help the local denizens out, and they might just give you what you need to find your identity. A local weather-woman, a lover without a nose, and a stubborn tumbleweed are some of the friends (or enemies) you’ll make on the way.

data.short_description: Retrieve your misplaced Identity from the Lost and Found at a Clown Convention. Use tools to change the faces of the people of Hacksaw Springs. Encounter a frazzled diner owner, a blueberry loving information broker, an unlicensed orthodontist and more on your way to find your lost self.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7870 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
